channel.title: Connection Problems
channel.description:
Alright, so I've got a server I'm working on, everything compile's fine, but now it's the hosting. I have found a way around having to portforward and use Hamachi.
I know this method works, because whenever I or my friend (diff comp on diff network) try to connect, we both get "Server Restarted Or Updated, Try Again In A Minute."
and that message wouldnt show up if it wasnt getting that response from the server I'm hosting.
Any ideas?
Contact me on msn for a faster reply :P Beyquin@yahoo.ca (yes that is my msn e-mail)

item.title: Connection Problems
item.dc:creator: @Beyquin Beyquin
